name: aXombie
description:
aXombie is a dramatic zombie smasher and shooter with unique atmosphere.

You are administrator of house where you are living, but you were not home cca for 1 week, because you had to go away because work journey. to a near pub. But as you went home, some weird things happened.

And here our story begins,
so good luck, you'll need it...

Control Keys: WASD=Move, Shift=Sprint; C=Crouch, F=Interaction, 123456789=Select Weapon, 0=Hide Weapon, LMB=Attack

Features

-Interesting and dramatic storyline about man searching for his wife

-A lot of rebuses where you must explore the enviroment and think

-3 chapters with different atmosphere, weapons and enemies

-9 melee and 18 shooting weapons

-Unique atmosphere
